meanings.definition: Animals bred or raised at home.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor has a few homebreds in her backyard.
meanings.sent2: The farmer takes pride in his homebreds, ensuring they are well cared for.
meanings.sent3: The homebreds decided to have a race around the farm for fun.
meanings.sent4: The homebreds grazed peacefully in the meadow, a picture of domestic bliss.
meanings.sent5: The children loved visiting the farm to see the homebreds up close.

meanings.definition: People who are born and raised in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The small town was full of friendly homebreds who knew each other well.
meanings.sent2: She was a proud homebred, always loyal to her hometown.
meanings.sent3: The group of homebreds organized a community picnic to celebrate their roots.
meanings.sent4: He considered himself a true homebred, with deep connections to the local traditions.
meanings.sent5: The homebreds gathered at the town square for the annual festival, reminiscing about their shared childhood memories.
